verses.text: Have you a - ny room for Je - sus, He who bore your load of sin? Has he found when bless there was no room to come in? And did thou a try room-for Je - sus? Not one room in all the inn; Have you a - ny room for Je - sus? Not one room in all the inn.
Room for pleasure, room for business, But for Christ the crucified; Not a place that he can enter in the heart for which he died? Have you a - ny room for Je - sus? Not one room in all the inn.

Room for Jesus, King of Glory? Hasten now, his word obey; Swing the heart's door wide- ly open, Bid him enter while you may. Have you a - ny room for Je - sus? With his heav - ly grace to fill - ering love and free?

refrain.text: Room for Jesus, King of Glory! Hasten now, his word obey; Have you a - ny room? Have you a - ny room? Have you a - ny room for Je - sus? Make room! make room! Make room for Je - sus!
